pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, August 13, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

North Milton, Prince Edward Island

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with seniors at the Milton Community Hall.

Milton Community Hall
7 New Glasgow Road

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media should arrive no later than 10:00 a.m.

Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Old Home Week fair.

Red Shores Racetrack and Casino
58 Kensington Road

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media should present themselves no later than 12:30 p.m. at the viewing tarmac in front of the racetrack.

2:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a strawberry social and will deliver remarks.

Connaught Square

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 1:40 p.m.

Media appearances 

7:45 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on Island Mornings, CBC Prince Edward Island 96.1 FM.

8:10 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on The Islandâ€™s Country, CFCY 95.1.

11:40 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on Ocean 100.
